attributes.action: Introduce a bill to amend statute law to allow juries in criminal trials the option to give verdicts of "Not Proven"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introducing "Not Proven" verdicts akin to the verdict in Scottish Legal System, to allow Juries an alternative option of having to deliver "Not Guilty" Verdicts, when although the case against the defendant has not been proven beyond reasonable doubt by the Crown, the jury feel on the balance of probability, the defendant is guilty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
